verses.text:
Except the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, they \w labour|strong="H5998"\w* in \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* that \w build|strong="H1129"\w* it: except the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, the \w watchman|strong="H8104"\w* \w waketh|strong="H8245"\w* \add but\add* in \w vain|strong="H7723"\w*.  +  r 127.1  t for…: or, of Solomon *  +  r 127.1  t that…: Heb. that are builders of it in it *

\add It is\add* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* for you to rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w*, to sit \w up|strong="H3427"\w* \w late|strong="H0309"\w*, to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of \w sorrows|strong="H6089"\w*: \add for\add* so he \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* his \w beloved|strong="H3039"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*.

Lo, \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \add are\add* an \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \add and\add* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of the \w womb|strong="H0990"\w* \add is his\add* \w reward|strong="H7939"\w*.
As \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* \add are\add* in the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of a mighty \w man|strong="H1368"\w*; so \add are\add* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.

\w Happy|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* the \w man|strong="H1397"\w* that hath his \w quiver|strong="H0827"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of them: they shall not be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, but they shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* with the \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.\f + \fr 127.5 \ft his…: Heb. filled his quiver with them\f*\f + \fr 127.5 \ft speak…: or, subdue, or, destroy\f*
